meanings.sent1: She loved wearing her cozy woolens during winter.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of woolens like sweaters and scarves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to chew on the woolens hanging on the clothesline.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of woolens was a rainbow of warmth in the cold season.
meanings.sent5: The softness of her woolens was like a hug from a cloud.

meanings.sent1: Grandma knitted beautiful woolens for the family every year.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed elegant woolens in their window.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to bury the woolens in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The woolens felt like a second skin, keeping her snug in the chill.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the woolens were a testament to the skill of the knitter.

meanings.sent1: She bought colorful woolens to knit a sweater for her niece.
meanings.sent2: The craft store had a sale on woolens for all knitting enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy unraveled the ball of woolens and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: The woolens twisted and turned into a beautiful tapestry of colors.
meanings.sent5: The softness of the woolens against her skin inspired her to create more.
